resources.string: Welcome to our audio loop latency measuring app. To run a test press the button below. Results will be presented on the chart.
The test was interrupted by background noise. Please make sure that no other sounds are audible in the room and volume is set to maximum.

Unfortunately, your phone has too high latency level for any sound processing. Professional audio applications require the round-trip latency to be below 20ms, compared to %1$sms reached by your device.

Close! Professional audio applications requirethe round-trip latency to be below 20ms, compared to %1$sms reached by your device. You can try using it with some audio software but delays might prove too high.
Great! Your phone has the round-trip latency of %1$sms which is below 20ms! Your phone can use pro audio features!
